alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 27 at 2:55AM MST until November 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 55 MPH with gusts up to 75 MPH likely. Isolated wind gusts in excess of 80 MPH cannot be ruled out. * WHERE...Interstate 25 corridor in Platte and Converse Counties between Chugwater and Douglas. * WHEN...11 AM MST today until 5 AM MST Monday. The strongest winds are expected after 5 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County
